description:
Taxi Magic is now Curb.

Getting a great ride is faster and easier than ever. Curb connects you to professional, fully-insured taxi and for-hire drivers in 60 cities nationwide.

Request a ride in seconds. Get picked up in minutes.
Connect with nearby licensed, fully-insured drivers to experience the safest ride on the road.
Track your ride on the map as it arrives to you.
Pay your fare using the Curb app, or pay with cash.
Receive an email receipt when you pay through the app.
Rate your ride - your feedback makes us better!
Invite friends to earn free Curb rides.
Whenever you need it, wherever you go, with Curb your ride is here.

Check out the links below to see where you can ride with Curb and how to share your feedback!

Curb Cities: GoCurb.com/cities
Curb Support: GoCurb.com/support
Developer website: GoCurb.com

Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
releaseNotes:
- Better access for visually impaired users
- Phone's location now only pulled when app is in use
- Bug fixes and other enhancements
- Need help? Contact us at support@gocurb.com and we'll take care of it.

Enjoyed your Curb experience? Give us a shout out on Twitter @gocurb and leave a review in the App Store.
